parameters.name: EdgeCount
parameters.description: Number of edges for this edge flange

title: IEdgeFlangeFeatureData.IGetEdges
description: Gets the edges for this edge flange.

parameters.name: EdgeCount
parameters.description: Number of edges for this edge flange

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of edges for this edge flange VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
IEdgeFlangeFeatureData::GetEdgeCount
before calling this method to determine the size of the array.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
